short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays FilmWeb ratings on HBO Go and Netflix.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do you always check FilmWeb rating before you watch a movie or series on your favorite streaming platform? If so, this extension will save your time. It displays the ratings directly on the website so that you don't have to search FilmWeb for that.
